C U Vivek Performance Engineer

About Me Projects

My Expertise

Experienced in performance testing, monitoring, and optimization of large-scale applications. Skilled in workload modeling, root cause analysis, and tuning across application, database, and infrastructure layers to ensure scalability and reliability.

Performance

JMeter and k6 generate realistic load, while Dynatrace provides deep monitoring and insights—together ensuring end-to-end performance testing and analysis

Code

Python and JavaScript enable powerful automation by combining Python’s scripting and data-handling strength with JavaScript’s web and UI interaction capabilities

Tools

GitHub Actions and Jenkins automate performance testing pipelines, enabling continuous, scalable, and repeatable test execution with integrated reporting
